Class ServerStatusServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.rmi.AbstractServer
      • org.transitime.ipc.servers.ServerStatusServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, ServerStatusInterface

    public class ServerStatusServer
extends AbstractServer
implements ServerStatusInterface
    Runs on the server side and receives IPC calls and returns results.

    SkiBu Smith

      • monitor

        public java.lang.String monitor()
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ServerStatusInterface
        Monitors the agency server for problems. If there is a problem then a message indicating such is returned. Sending out notifications is done by the server side.
        Specified by:
        monitor in interface ServerStatusInterface
        Returns:
        Error message if there is one, otherwise null
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
